Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

test.doc: Generate two random numbers to pick two random items from the product page and calculate the price

suite.doc: This file contains the first test case to code for the spriteCloud automation challenge: Write a full checkout that contains, at least, two items. Validate the final price.
This init file will be run before every single file within the same folder. This allows some repetitive task to be just written once.
